channel.title: Client help
channel.description:
Welcome, Ok I have a server and I custom code stuff. But I want to know If there is a way where I can just use the client for people to run and I can also use just to log on. I want the server files still My server files are "Reapagescape v1" So I usally run my server from there. So do I need to start my code over on a Client?
Also I need some help with a client. I need a good base and I also need to know where I can change it to make it automatically go to my server IP. If you can please help me.
Mostly:
1.Need to know If i can still keep server files to compile the "Server" 2.Need a client for people to use to connect to the "Server" 3.If you can help me thanks if not its ok. :)

item.title: Client help
item.dc:creator: @hellwsfull hellwsfull
item.description:
@hellwsfull wrote:

yes well i dont have equi.java:S

Read full topic

item.title: Client help
item.dc:creator: @XxHawkxX XxHawkxX
item.description:
@XxHawkxX wrote:

not sure what you mean but i do know to make it automatically go to your ip go into your client files then go to EGUI.JAVA then change the ip’s to yours

Read full topic
